amendment.description: To strike the appropriations for the Office of Management and Budget.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2585 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 368.

action.text: Amendment SA 2585 proposed by Senator Van Hollen to Amendment SA 2360. To strike the appropriations for the Office of Management and Budget.
